column4: i was rally excited for installing ubuntu and trying it, but after all this problems, i give up, i guess i'll stay with windows :s it's kinda sad, isn't it ..
not patient enough?  typical windoze user. :p
now tell me again i'm not patient enough ><
i have tried it with ubuntu 6.06, you think 'll have to try 6.10 ? would that matter/go better ?
might do. what kinda problem u had? with grub?
did u setup partitions and mount points correctly?
i have 2 seperate harddisks, so i set it up at one
and and yes, ive been reinstalling it with help of juano, and it really was right
well u can give it try with suse or ubuntu 6.10. hard to say, if that will solve problem.
pfft, :s, i just want to have linux on my second disk :s i hadn't espected it would be so hard, everyone said it was so easy etc :s
i have ubuntu + win on 2 hdds
yeah, and i want that too, but it just won't work :s
